definition: to make into/to change into/-ization/to ... -ize/to transform/abbr. for 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]

sentences.english: But he did not lay out a timescale for his plan.
sentences.chinese: 但是对于无核化进程他却没有一个明确的计划表。

sentences.english: China strongly urged Pyongyang to promote denuclearisation of the Korean peninsula.
sentences.chinese: 中国此前强烈敦促平壤促进朝鲜半岛的无核化。

sentences.english: He said the premier, Wen Jiabao, would push for denuclearisation and a return to the six-party talks.
sentences.chinese: 他说，总理温家宝将推动无核化进程和重启六方会谈。

sentences.english: First, the objective of a denuclearized Korean Peninsula has been set.
sentences.chinese: 一是确立了朝鲜半岛无核化目标。

sentences.english: Both sides support the efforts to denuclearize the Korean Peninsula.
sentences.chinese: 双方支持实现朝鲜半岛无核化的努力。

sentences.english: "We have never objected to the denuclearisation of the Korean Peninsula and of the world itself, " it said.
sentences.chinese: 我们从没有放弃朝鲜半岛以及世界范围的无核化。

sentences.english: Negotiations over the denuclearisation of the Korean peninsula look set to resume.
sentences.chinese: 关于朝鲜半岛无核化的谈判看来肯定将要重新启动。

sentences.english: We uphold realizing denuclearization on the Peninsula through dialogue and consultation.
sentences.chinese: 我们一贯主张，通过对话协商实现半岛无核化。

sentences.english: Hill has been the point man in six-nation negotiations aimed at getting rid of North Korea's nuclear weapons capabilities.
sentences.chinese: 希尔是北韩无核化六方会谈的关键人物。

sentences.english: ROK and China hold the same opinion and stand on realizing the goal of denuclearization of the Korean Peninsula.
sentences.chinese: 韩中在实现半岛无核化目标上看法和立场一致。

definition: summit talks/discussion between heads of state
North and South Korea/bilateral Korean relations
